title: Assateague Island National Seashore: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved        Looking for how to get involved? Browse through the links below.      NPS Centennial 2016 is the 100th birthday of the National Park Service. Take a look at how we are celebrating and get involved!      Volunteer  Join us in preserving the park for future generations.      Planning  Looking to the future? Assateague Island National Seashore prepares a variety of planning and environmental documents to help guide it in managing park resources. Find out if any current opportunities exist to share your voice, or browse past planning documents.       Support Your Park Discover ways to support Assateague!
